PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Using the same calculation , the π-π stacking distance ( d π ) was 3.7 Å.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| π-π stacking distance (dπ) |
| 3.7 Å |

In this paragraph, the two "Property Value" entities are "π-π stacking distance (dπ)" and "3.7 Å". The first one is a distance measurement in Angstroms (Å) used in physics and chemistry to describe the distance between two parallel planes, in this case, the distance between two π systems. The second one is the actual value of this distance, measured to be 3.7 Angstroms.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I have determined that there is only one clear "Property Value" entity in the text. Here is the updated table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 3.7 Å |

The entity "3.7 Å" is a value of the material property "π-π stacking distance (dπ)". However, the phrase "π-π stacking distance (dπ)" is not a value, but rather a description of a type of material property. Therefore, I have not included it in the table.
